snippet: Readers discuss the recent revelations. If Mr. Trump lost other people’s money, why does he get the tax benefits, one reader wonders....
lead_paragraph: Readers discuss the recent revelations. If Mr. Trump lost other people’s money, why does he get the tax benefits, one reader wonders.

headline.print_headline: About Donald Trump’s Tax Records: Other Voices
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Tax Records: Other Voices
